mapper.insert: insert into wp_user (id, user_login, user_pass, user_nicename, user_email, user_url, user_registered, user_activation_key, user_status, display_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRegistered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userActivationKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update wp_user set user_login = #{userLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pass = #{userPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_nicename = #{userNicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_url = #{userUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_registered = #{userRegistered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_activation_key = #{userActivationKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_login, user_pass, user_nicename, user_email, user_url, user_registered, user_activation_key, user_status, display_name from wp_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
